data.name: Fission Superstar X - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
33 mind melting space MP3 music tracks for your planet dweller ears.

01 Welcome to the Leopoldodrome - 02:35
02 A Most Glorious Mission - 01:13
03 Cosmic Revelation - 00:49
04 Nuclear Heroes - 01:07
05 Super Highway - 02:05
06 Incoming Transmission I - 00:44
07 Mission Superstar - 01:59
08 Space Lounge Party ! - 01:44
09 Tales from Outer Space - 01:02
10 The Sad Grace of Space Whales - 02:03
11 Incoming Transmission II - 00:45
12 Space Abominations ( a Madman's Rejects ) - 01:09
13 Jupiter Hive - 02:04
14 Masters of Illusion - 01:07
15 Incoming Transmission III - 00:47
16 Planetary Hostilities - 02:25
17 Superstar Victory Concert - 01:07
18 Radiant Colors - 01:16
19 Space Arsenal - 01:35
20 Mysterious Radiation Bursts - 02:09
21 Miss Hungry Planetoid - 02:00
22 Fearless Pirates - 01:14
23 Bandits in the Mirror Are Closer Than They Appear - 01:06
24 Final Confrontation - 02:59
25 Celine's Theme ( Space Credits ) - 03:25
26 Space Game Over ( from Space ) - 00:06
27 Damned ! Planet Vaporized ... - 00:10
28 Solar Tour Over - 00:32

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.33 GHZ 2 cores
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Pixel Shader/Vertex Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHZ 4 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Pixel Shader/Vertex Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
